mapper.select: select s1.*,s2.arre from (select user.id,user.idcard,user.password,user.money as decimals,user.header_img as headerImage,user.grande as sex,user.phone,user.create_time,user.update_time,user.username,user.user_id ,address.address from user left join address on user.user_id=address.user_id where address.is_check=1 and user.user_id=#{openId} ) as s1 LEFT JOIN (select sum(arrears.money) as arre,arrears.user_id as arrears from arrears where arrears.user_id=#{openId}) as s2 on s1.user_id = s2.arrears
